traits.name: Flurry of Blows (2/Short Rest)
traits.desc: If the protector has attacked this turn, it can make an additional unarmed strike as a bonus action. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Patient Defense (2/Short Rest)
traits.desc: The protector can take the Dodge action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While not wearing armor, the protector's AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The protector makes two attacks, one with its quarterstaff and one with its unarmed strike.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
